subject: DONATION OFFER
body:
I am Mr  Tom Crist, the Canadian who won $40 million lottery prize, I
writes
to inform you that Google in partnership with Facebook has submitted your
email address to receive $4,800,000.00 from me, as I have decided to give
part of my earnings to charity, individuals and organizations, contact me
if you are one of my lucky winners for more information in the
email:  tomcrist899@gmail.com

Please be sure to help those in Ukraine with this opportunity once you
receive my donation.

Thank you
Tom Christ
